screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 20 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*25 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125 if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 10 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 listwidth = self.getListWidth() + 10 if (listwidth > 580): listwidth = 580 if (listwidth > wsizex): wsizex = listwidth wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(65, 8 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-4, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(2, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 2)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))
